alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 9:51PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...An area of thunderstorms with heavy downpours will impact portions of northwestern Tolland, Hartford and south central Hampden Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 950 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms with heavy downpours along a line extending from Granby to near East Hartford. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Hartford, New Britain, West Hartford, Manchester, East Hartford, Enfield, Newington, Vernon, Windsor, Wethersfield, South Windsor, Farmington, Simsbury, Bloomfield, Avon, Plainville, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Ellington and Tolland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
